author: Melanie🌴
text:
Day 10 of #100daysofcode I think I've decided that this week would be for projects and next week I would continue my course. I'm almost done with the pop up pagr and I was able to upload the files for the qrcode project on github.

author: Melanie🌴
text:
I've just completed a front-end coding challenge from Frontend Mentor.

You can see my solution here: https://t.co/fgP41zqIlY

Any suggestions on how I can improve from front-end devs in my network are very welcome. Thanks!

author: Melanie🌴
text: Day 9 of #100DaysOfCode So today I had a truckload of schoolwork but I still had little time to do bits and pieces. Currently working on a Newsletter subscription pop up page.✌ https://t.co/tHWSxrV3by
